name: Radiant Exoskeleton
description: A giant piece of bone that glows coldly, taken from the exterior of a glowingbeast.  These beasts blessed by the ancient power of the moon are able to manipulatetheir exoskeletons through the light that has soaked into their marrow overlong years. Even though their bones float apart from their bodies, they canstill command them at will like any other physical part.
